metadata.title: CVE-2018-18408 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free was discovered in the tcpbridge binary of Tcpreplay 4.3.0beta1. The issue gets triggered in the function post_args() at tcpbridge.c,causing a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
